name: DMC-6 Gen 3
details:
MIDI ControllerThe DMC-6 Gen3 is our most powerful next generation compact MIDI controller.  The DMC-6D was the very first Gen2 controller from Disaster Area, and it really pushed the boundaries by adding additional presets, control modes, device support, and connectivity.  We first offered the DMC-6D way back in 2013, and now the time has come for us to give it the Gen3 treatment.
http://www.disasterareaamps.com/shop/dmc-6-gen3
